t1_no: Find the main T1/IRB/MRN document number near the header (e.g., "IRB NO", "MRN", or a single number next to "No"). Keep exact formatting and add to t1_no.
t1_date: Extract the document date from the header area (look for "Tarih/Date" or a date next to the main header). Keep the original format and add to t1_date.
export_declaration_no: If the form references an export declaration number (e.g., "IHRACAT BEYANNAMESI NUMARASI"), copy it to export_declaration_no.
export_declaration_date: If an export declaration date is present, copy it as-is to export_declaration_date.
invoice_no: If invoice numbers are listed in the documents section ("INVOICE NO"), extract them. If multiple, join with "; ". Add to invoice_no.
invoice_date: If invoice dates are present near invoice numbers, extract them and add to invoice_date (join with "; " if multiple).
country_of_origin: Extract the origin/shipping country (e.g., "Sevk/Ihracat Ulkesi" or "Country of origin"). Keep exact value and add to country_of_origin.
exporter: Extract the exporter/consignor name and address (e.g., "Gonderici/Ihracatci", "Consignor"). Add to exporter.
importer: Extract the consignee/importer name and address (e.g., "Alici", "Consignee"). Add to importer.
buyer: If a separate buyer is listed, extract it; otherwise leave empty. Add to buyer.
seller: If a separate seller is listed, extract it; otherwise leave empty. Add to seller.
destination: Extract the destination country/place (e.g., "Varis Ulkesi", "Destination"). Add to destination.
container_no: Extract container number if present ("Konteyner No"). Add to container_no.
packages: Extract total package count/type (e.g., "Toplam Kap Adedi", "Kaplarin Adet ve Cinsi"). Keep number and type in one line and add to packages.
net_weight: Extract total net weight ("Net Agirlik (kg)") and add to net_weight with units as shown.
gross_weight: Extract total gross weight ("Brut Agirlik (kg)") and add to gross_weight with units as shown.
veterinary_certificate_no: If a veterinary certificate number is listed in the documents section, extract it and add to veterinary_certificate_no.
HS_code: Extract HS/tariff codes from item lines ("Esya Kodu"). If multiple, join with "; ". Add to HS_code.
products: Create product_1, product_2, ... from the item list (e.g., "Kalem Listesi" or goods table). Keep order from the document.
products[*].name_product: Extract the goods description ("Esyanin Tanimi" / description of goods). Add to products[i].name_product.
products[*].latin_name: If a Latin species name appears (often in parentheses), extract it to products[i].latin_name.
products[*].size_product: Extract size/grade from the goods line (e.g., 0.8-1.2 KG). Add to products[i].size_product.
products[*].unit_box: Extract unit of measure (e.g., KG, BOX, PCS) and add to products[i].unit_box.
products[*].packages: Extract package count/type for the line item and add to products[i].packages.
products[*].net_weight: Extract net weight per line item and add to products[i].net_weight.
products[*].gross_weight: Extract gross weight per line item and add to products[i].gross_weight.
products[*].HS_code: Extract HS/tariff code per line item and add to products[i].HS_code.
